title: Supernova Power Men
review:
I was glued to the screen just sucking up every moment of this experience, I am in hospital watching this documentary from my tablet.

this just gave me the confidence to fight my current challenges.

just wow!

title: Awesome!
review: Superb demonstration of obstinacy, perseverance, self-denial and ... talent. Tommy Caldwell and Kevin Jorgeson are awesome! Skill level: 10/10. Endurance: 10/10. After such a documentary, you feel almost derisory or tiny. And then, it's a boost!

title: A Movie for Everyone!
review: This is a documentary about the power of the human spirit to overcome and accomplish the impossible. The power of friendship and love in the face of adversity is beautifully crafted in this true story. The cinematography is absolutely gorgeous and a behind the scenes at the end is a whole other bonus movie at the end.
